description:
'''Motionless in White''' is an American [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band from [[Scranton, Pennsylvania]]. Formed in 2004, the band consists of lead vocalist Chris "Motionless" Cerulli, guitarists Ryan Sitkowski and Ricky "Horror" Olson, drummer Vinny Mauro and bassist Justin Morrow. Cerulli is the only member of the original line-up that remains in the band. The group has stated that their band name derived from the [[Eighteen Visions]] song "[[Motionless and White]]".

Motionless in White was signed to [[Fearless Records]] for their first [[Motionless in White discography|three studio albums]]; their fourth album, ''[[Graveyard Shift (album)|Graveyard Shift]]'', was released in May 2017 through [[Roadrunner Records]]. Their fifth album, ''[[Disguise (album)|Disguise]]'', was released in June 2019, followed by their sixth album, ''[[Scoring the End of the World]]'', in June 2022.
